description: These crispy baked curry fries are covered in hot Indian spices and served with refreshing silken tofu cucumber mint raita.
name: Hot Curry Fries with Vegan Cucumber Mint Raita
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp. cornstarch (optional, but highly recommended for crisping)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 450o. Cut potatoes into 1/4 inch thick matchsticks. Place in large bowl and add oil, cornstarch, curry powder, salt and pepper. Toss to coat. Arrange in an even layer on 1 large or 2 medium baking sheets.
Bake until crisp and browned in spots, about 30-35 minutes, flipping 2-3 times during cooking.
